channel.title: Papers on Vedang Lad
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Vedang Lad

item.title: The Remarkable Robustness of LLMs: Stages of Inference?
item.description: We demonstrate and investigate the remarkable robustness of Large Language Models by deleting and swapping adjacent layers.

item.title: Opening the AI black box: program synthesis via mechanistic interpretability
item.description: We present a program syntesis method from automated mechanistic interpretibility for RNNs training on integer variable tasks

item.title: Estimating label quality and errors in semantic segmentation data via any model
item.description: This paper proposes a novel method to find label errors in semantic segmentation datasets.
